testcase.name: Prouser Submit a Claim as passenger in a car
testcase.system-out: Given prouser logins into whiplash application..............................passed When prouser enter all mandatory details for claim creation as 'The driver' and 'YES' and 'NO'.passed Then claim is created for prouser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator receives claim and claim liability sent to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is sent to the compensator.....................................passed When compensator receives claim and send to TPA.............................passed Then claims acceptance and liability decision is now sent to TPA............passed

testcase.name: TPA Denies Claim and claim Liability
testcase.system-out: Given the claim has been sent to the TPA workbasket........................passed When TPA dispute claim liability............................................passed Then claims acceptance and liability information is passed to claimant......passed

testcase.name: Prouser challenge decision and go to court and submit documents
testcase.system-out: Given Prouser claim liability has been rejected.............................passed When prouser wants to challenge decision and decided to go to court.........passed Then the claimant goes to court.............................................passed

testcase.name: TPA disagree for document selection
testcase.system-out: Given Uploaded documents for court cofirmed by Claimant.....................passed When TPA disagrees to court documents uploaded by Claimant at 'Pending-LiabilityListReview'.passed Then claimant need to review the documents uploaded by TPA..................passed

testcase.name: prouser Claimant acknowledges TPA doc selection and case is resolved
testcase.system-out: Given prouser receives claim for acknowledgement............................passed When prouser claimant acknowledge for liability challenge...................passed Then case is closed at court stage..........................................passed

testcase.name: TPA reopens claim and make full liability to claimant
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is resolved at court............................................passed When TPA reopens liability disputed claim...................................passed Then TPA accepts full liability after reopening the claim...................passed

testcase.name: Claimant Request first Interim Payment and added fees
testcase.system-out: Given claim has been accepted for 'prouser'.................................passed When 'prouser' requests interim payment.....................................passed And 'prouser' adds fee......................................................passed Then interim payment request is sent to compensator.........................passed

testcase.name: Compensator makes first interim payment
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When compensator makes interim payment......................................passed Then claimant receives interim payment......................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant reviews and accepts first interim payment
testcase.system-out: Given claim has been accepted for 'prouser'.................................passed When 'prouser' reviews and accept interim decision..........................passed Then payment is not received by the claimant................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant decides to go to court for interim over non-payment
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' interim non-payment SLA is breached.........................passed When Go to court for non-payment option is enabled for 'prouser'............passed Then claimant decides to go to court over interim non-payment...............passed

testcase.name: Claimant select court docs for interim non-payment
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' goes to court over interim..................................passed When "prouser" selected Court proceeding started as No......................passed And "prouser" selected documents for court NON payment of Interim...........passed Then court document are sent to compensator.................................passed

testcase.name: TPA reviews court document for Interim non-payment
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When Compensator reviews court document for interim.........................passed Then court docs sent for review to claimant.................................passed

testcase.name: prouser Claimant acknowledges TPA doc selection and case is resolved
testcase.system-out: Given prouser receives claim for acknowledgement............................passed When prouser claimant acknowledge for Interim...............................passed Then case is closed at court stage..........................................passed

testcase.name: Prouser uploads medical report
testcase.system-out: Given upload medical report is enabled for 'prouser'........................passed When "prouser" uploads medical report without Uplift request................passed Then medical report is uploaded and offer request is sent to compensator....passed

testcase.name: TPA makes First Offer with fee proposal
testcase.system-out: Given claimant requests offer to TPA........................................passed When the TPA makes first offer with fee proposal............................passed Then claim will be sent for claimant acknowledgement........................passed

testcase.name: prouser accepts offer and rejects fee proposal
testcase.system-out: Given prouser review fee proposal...........................................passed When prouser accepts offer and makes counter fees proposal..................passed Then pro counter offer sent to compensator for review.......................passed

testcase.name: TPA rejects claimants fee offer
testcase.system-out: Given Prouser rejects fee offer.............................................passed When TPA rejects claimant fee offer.........................................passed Then TPA sends the updated fee offer to prouser.............................passed

testcase.name: prouser go to court for fee proposal
testcase.system-out: Given Prouser reject fee proposal...........................................passed When prouser reject fee offer decided to go to court........................passed And "prouser" selected Court proceeding started as Yes......................passed And "prouser" selected documents for court fees disagreement................passed Then the claimant goes to court.............................................passed

testcase.name: TPA acknowledges documents selected for court
testcase.system-out: Given claimant selects court documents TPA..................................passed When TPA agrees to court documents when claim is in 'Pending-FeesListReview'.passed Then claim is sent to claimant..............................................passed

testcase.name: prouser Claimant acknowledges Compensators doc selection and case is resolved
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' checks the documents uploaded by Compensator................passed When "prouser" submit the claim for court with claim for fee dispute subsequent court applications.passed Then case is closed at court stage..........................................passed
